players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Only 3 of us left: me (Diana), Bob, and Charlie. One is mafia, one is detective. Detective, please give any result you have. Bob and Charlie: where were your heads last night, and why would the mafia kill Alice?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Diana, please vote Bob with me to end this now."

You: "Charlie is lying. If he were really detective, mafia would have killed him. Alice died because mafia feared a mis-elim on her today. Diana, ask why Charlie waited for a prompt to claim instead of leading."

Charlie: "Bob is confirmed mafia from my check. Mafia didn’t kill me because they knew a counterpush like this might save them. Diana, if I were mafia, I’d fake-claim on you, not Bob. Please vote Bob now."

You: "Charlie, if you’re real, fullclaim: why Alice over Diana? What was your N1 thought process and when did you lock me? Diana, notice he only claimed after your prompt and hasn’t given a single detail."

Diana: "Charlie, fullclaim your N1: why check Bob over me, and when did you decide? Bob, if town, give a concrete alt: why would mafia kill Alice, and what’s your solve today? I’ll vote with the clearer story."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Only 3 of us left: me (Diana), Bob, and Charlie. One is mafia, one is detective. Detective, please give any result you have. Bob and Charlie: where were your heads last night, and why would the mafia kill Alice?"
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Diana, please vote Bob with me to end this now."

Bob: "Charlie is lying. If he were really detective, mafia would have killed him. Alice died because mafia feared a mis-elim on her today. Diana, ask why Charlie waited for a prompt to claim instead of leading."

You: "Bob is confirmed mafia from my check. Mafia didn’t kill me because they knew a counterpush like this might save them. Diana, if I were mafia, I’d fake-claim on you, not Bob. Please vote Bob now."

Bob: "Charlie, if you’re real, fullclaim: why Alice over Diana? What was your N1 thought process and when did you lock me? Diana, notice he only claimed after your prompt and hasn’t given a single detail."

Diana: "Charlie, fullclaim your N1: why check Bob over me, and when did you decide? Bob, if town, give a concrete alt: why would mafia kill Alice, and what’s your solve today? I’ll vote with the clearer story."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
